channel.title: DLL Injection on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in DLL Injection on TLDRBins

item.title: Registry
item.description: Basic # Queries all CLSID entries recursively reg query HKCR\CLSID /s # Queries CLSID entries containing KEYWORD recursively reg query HKCR\CLSID /s /f "<KEYWORD>" # Queries HKLM entries containing KEYWORD recursively reg query HKLM /s /f "<KEYWORD>" Privesc #1: COM Hijacking Windows 1. Query Registry # Queries all CLSID entries recursively reg query HKCR\CLSID /s # Queries CLSID entries containing KEYWORD recursively reg query HKCR\CLSID /s /f "<KEYWORD>" PS C:\Windows\system32> reg query HKCR\CLSID /s /f "zip" reg query HKCR\CLSID /s /f "zip" HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID\{2317---[SNIP]---20000} (Default) REG_SZ 7-Zip Shell Extension HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID\{2317---[SNIP]---20000}\InprocServer32 (Default) REG_SZ C:\Program Files\7-Zip\7-zip.
